user.title: Logger Manager
user.description:
Logger Manager helps you manage Home Assistant logging levels.

After setup:
• Check sensor.logger_levels for current state
• Use logger_manager.apply_levels service to change log levels
• The Logger Manager card will be automatically added to Dashboard Resources (storage mode only)
• Add the card to your dashboard for a visual interface

No configuration needed - click Submit to continue.

abort.already_configured: Logger Manager is already configured. Only one instance is allowed.

init.title: Logger Manager Options
init.description:
YAML list of glob patterns (one per line). Supports glob wildcards (`*`, `?`). These are **additive** to built-in defaults and do not replace them.

• Examples: `homeassistant.components.zha*`, `custom_components.logger_manager*`, `asyncio`

⚠️ Avoid overly broad patterns like `*` — this may list thousands of loggers and impact performance.

error.too_broad: Pattern `*` is too broad. Please use a more specific glob.
